availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John H. Sandefur (Louisville, Kentucky, tailor and soldier)

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, tailor and soldier. Mercer County, Kentucky native. Served in the 34th Kentucky Volunteer Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) as a private from 1863 to 1865. Tailor in Louisville in 1865.

ab.bibl:
Henry Tanner, ed., Tanner√≠s Louisville Directory and Business Advertiser for 1861 (Louisville: Directory Publication and Advertising Agency, 1861), p. 509.
Compiled Service Records of Volunteer Union Soldiers who Served in Organizations From State of Kentucky, NARA RG 94, Microfilm Series M397, Roll 411.
